categories: 15mm Front Axle for Road and Cross Bikes
description: Replacement front axle for road and cyclocross bikes with 15mm thru-axles.Made of 7075-T6 aluminum.Compatible with 100mm wide hubs (O.L.D.).Axle diameter is 15mm.Axle length from the end of the axle to the base of the quick-release mechanism is 130mm.Thread is M14 x 1.5.
name: Evo 15mm Front Axle for Road and Cross Bikes
